content:
alexcrichton commented on issue #4205:

For anyone curious the main body of work is here, and @fitzgen if you've got any questions about how the pieces here relate to future changes (e.g. the VMComponentContext) I'm happy to explain and/or soup up comments as necessary. I'm ideally shooting for all of this to be thoroughly documented internally as well since I'm sure I won't be the only one working on this indefinitely.
